automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.surface

Class ColorModelSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.surface.ColorModelSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceColor

    public class ColorModelSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements SurfaceColor
    A simple SurfaceColor implementations that uses two ColorMode per plot type.
    Author:
    Eric
